<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs=""
>
[Spiritual Aid](/Feats.aspx?ID=4112) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #188: They Watched the Stars](/Sources.aspx?ID=194) pg. 83</row>

**Archetype** [Scions of Domora](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=202)

**Prerequisites**
[Scion of Domora Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=4106)

</column>

---

When you call your spirit guide for aid, its presence bolsters your will and agility. You gain the Spiritual Aid reaction.

 **Spiritual Aid** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** You fail a Reflex or Will saving throw; **Effect** You reroll the triggering saving throw. You must use the second result, even if it's worse. If you roll a success, you get a critical success instead.
name: Spiritual Aid
